Functions
AIS_Core_fnc_onNextFrame
Description

Executes a code once in non sched environment on the next frame.  Parameters:

_function

The function to run. <CODE>

_args

Parameters passed to the function executing. This will be the same array every execution. [optional] <ANY> Returns: Nothing

Examples

(begin example) [{player sideChat format ["This is frame %1, not %2", diag_frameno, _this select 0];}, [diag_frameno]] call AIS_Core_fnc_onNextFrame; (end)

Author

esteldunedain and PabstMirror, donated from ACE3
